meanings.definition: The number of live births per 1,000 of a population in a given year.
meanings.sent1: The birthrates in the city have been steadily increasing over the past decade.
meanings.sent2: The birthrates in developing countries often impact their overall population growth.
meanings.sent3: The birthrates at the zoo are so high that they had to expand the nursery!
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm for gardening is like the birthrates of a flourishing garden.
meanings.sent5: The birthrates in the village were so low that they had a celebration when a new baby was born.

meanings.definition: The rate at which births occur in a particular area or population.
meanings.sent1: The birthrates in the rural areas are lower compared to urban centers.
meanings.sent2: Researchers study birthrates to understand population trends.
meanings.sent3: The birthrates at the beach were so high that they ran out of baby sunscreen!
meanings.sent4: The birthrates of creativity in that community are truly inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The birthrates of ideas in the brainstorming session were off the charts.
